DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study ( 1 ) determine whether child nutrition-focused adoption encouragement message focus Quality Protein Maize ( QPM ) availability small quantity QPM seed effective increase QPM adoption health outcome young child , ( 2 ) determine whether consumption encouragement message technique ( e.g. , container earmark ) effective increase QPM target health outcome young child .
DOC.brief_title: Translating Adoption Improved Varieties Into Nutritional Impact
DOC.criteria: Households least one child 635 month age range August 2015 , least one household member attend field day demonstrate Quality Protein Maize , provide informed consent participation data collection eligible inclusion . Households study area member attends field day demonstrate Quality Protein Maize child appropriate age range exclude study . Furthermore , households mother child intend stay region study duration ( completion endline survey ) exclude study . Finally , exclude participant access land crop cultivation .
